title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
---

**[3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets**

**Product Overview:**
Experience seamless travel with our VINTAR 3-Pack travel power adapter, designed for efficient charging and versatility across multiple destinations. Perfect for your next trip to Italy, Uruguay, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Libya, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, and Vatican City, this adapter is your all-in-one solution for recharging your devices on the go.

**Key Features:**

- **Ultra-light and Compact Design:** Lightweight and compact, making it easy to carry in your luggage. Dimensions: 2.8" x 2.6" x 2.3" (inches).
- **Dual USB Ports:** Provides convenient charging for your cell phone, tablet, power bank, and other compatible devices, with each port capable of up to 2.4A output.
- **Safe and Grounded 3-prong Plug:** Equipped with a safe and grounded 3-prong plug, ensuring reliable and secure power delivery.
- **Wide Voltage Compatibility:** Supports dual voltage devices (100V-250V), making it suitable for a wide range of electronic devices.
- **Standard N American 2 or 3-prong Compatibility:** Designed to work with standard N American 2 or 3-prong flat pin plugs, ensuring compatibility with most travel needs.
- **Friendly Customer Service and Warranty:** Enjoy friendly customer service and a 12-month warranty on your purchase.

**Compatibility:**
- Compatible with cell phones, tablets, power banks, and other electronic devices.
- Ideal for travelers heading to Italy, Uruguay, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Libya, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, and Vatican City.
- NOT A CONVERTER. Devices must support 100V-250V dual voltage if not for low power electronics.

**Certifications:**
- CE certified
- FCC certified

**Why Choose VINTAR?**
- **Quality and Safety:** With CE and FCC certifications, you can trust that the VINTAR travel power adapter meets international safety and quality standards.
- **Customer Satisfaction:** Enjoy friendly customer service and a 12-month warranty to ensure your peace of mind.

**Product Specifications:**
- **Max Capacity:** 2500 Watt (max 250 Volt, 10 A)
- **Plug Type:** Grounded 3 prong plug
- **Compatible Countries:** Italy, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Libya, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, Vatican City
- **Dimensions:** 2.8" x 2.6" x 2.3" (inches)
- **Converter:** Not included

**Ideal For:**
- Travelers
- Business professionals
- Students
- Frequent flyers

**Get Ready for Your Next Adventure!**
Ensure you stay connected and powered up during your travels with VINTAR's reliable travel power adapter. Order now and make your trip easier and more convenient.

---

**Package Includes:**
- 3 x VINTAR Travel Power Adapters
- User Manual
- Warranty Card

**Customer Reviews:**
Read reviews from satisfied customers who have used this adapter on their travels. Trust the VINTAR travel power adapter for all your international charging needs.
